Ancient Tea Set.Description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with 2 Energy.
Ancient Tea Set.Name: Ancient Tea Set

Art of War.Description: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain an extra Energy next turn.
Art of War.Name: Art of War

Astrolabe.Description: Upon pickup, choose and Transform 3 cards, then Upgrade them.
Astrolabe.Name: Astrolabe

Bag of Marbles.Description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Bag of Marbles.Name: Bag of Marbles

Bag of Preparation.Description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.
Bag of Preparation.Name: Bag of Preparation

Bird-Faced Urn.Description: Whenever you play a Power, heal 2 HP.
Bird-Faced Urn.Name: Bird-Faced Urn

Black Blood.Description: Replaces Burning Blood. At the end of combat, heal 10 HP.
Black Blood.Name: Black Blood

Black Star.Description: Elites now drop 2 Relics when defeated.
Black Star.Name: Black Star

Blood Vial.Description: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.
Blood Vial.Name: Blood Vial

Bloody Idol.Description: Whenever you gain Gold, heal 5 HP.
Bloody Idol.Name: Bloody Idol

Blue Candle.Description: Curse cards can now be played. Playing a Curse will make you lose 1 HP and Exhausts the card.
Blue Candle.Name: Blue Candle

Bottled Flame.Description: Upon pick up, choose an Attack card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.
Bottled Flame.Name: Bottled Flame

Bottled Lightning.Description: Upon pick up, choose a Skill card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.
Bottled Lightning.Name: Bottled Lightning

Bottled Tornado.Description: Upon pick up, choose a Power card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.
Bottled Tornado.Name: Bottled Tornado

Bronze Scales.Description: Whenever you take damage, deal 3 damage back.
Bronze Scales.Name: Bronze Scales

Burning Blood.Description: At the end of combat, heal 6 HP.
Burning Blood.Name: Burning Blood

Calipers.Description: At the start of your turn, lose 15 Block rather than all of your Block.
Calipers.Name: Calipers

Centennial Puzzle.Description: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards.
Centennial Puzzle.Name: Centennial Puzzle

Champion Belt.Description: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, also apply 1 Weak.
Champion Belt.Name: Champion Belt

Charon's Ashes.Description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
Charon's Ashes.Name: Charon's Ashes

Cursed Key.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Whenever you open a non-boss chest, obtain a Curse.
Cursed Key.Name: Cursed Key

Darkstone Periapt.Description: Whenever you obtain a Curse, increase your Max HP by 6.
Darkstone Periapt.Name: Darkstone Periapt

Dead Branch.Description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card to your hand.
Dead Branch.Name: Dead Branch

Dream Catcher.Description: Whenever you rest, you may add a card to your deck.
Dream Catcher.Name: Dream Catcher

Du-Vu Doll.Description: For each Curse in your deck, start each combat with 1 additional Strength.
Du-Vu Doll.Name: Du-Vu Doll

Ectoplasm.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer gain Gold.
Ectoplasm.Name: Ectoplasm

Enchiridion.Description: Start each combat with a random Power card in your hand. It costs 0 until the end of turn.
Enchiridion.Name: Enchiridion

Eternal Feather.Description: For every 5 cards in your deck, heal 2 HP whenever you enter a Rest Site.
Eternal Feather.Name: Eternal Feather

Frozen Egg.Description: Whenever you add a Power card to your deck, it is Upgraded.
Frozen Egg.Name: Frozen Egg

Frozen Eye.Description: When viewing your Draw Pile, the cards are now shown in order.
Frozen Eye.Name: Frozen Eye

Gambling Chip.Description: At the start of each combat, discard any number of cards then draw that many.
Gambling Chip.Name: Gambling Chip

Ginger.Description: You can no longer become Weakened.
Ginger.Name: Ginger

Girya.Description: You can now gain Strength at Rest Sites. (3 times max)
Girya.Name: Girya

Gremlin Horn.Description: Whenever an enemy dies, gain 1 Energy and draw 1 card.
Gremlin Horn.Name: Gremlin Horn

Ice Cream.Description: Energy is now conserved between turns.
Ice Cream.Name: Ice Cream

Juzu Bracelet.Description: Regular enemy combats are no longer encountered in ? rooms.
Juzu Bracelet.Name: Juzu Bracelet

Kunai.Description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Dexterity.
Kunai.Name: Kunai

Lantern.Description: Gain 1 Energy on the first turn of each combat.
Lantern.Name: Lantern

Lee's Waffle.Description: Raise your Max HP by 7 and heal all of your HP.
Lee's Waffle.Name: Lee's Waffle

Letter Opener.Description: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.
Letter Opener.Name: Letter Opener

Lizard Tail.Description: When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once).
Lizard Tail.Name: Lizard Tail

Magic Flower.Description: Healing is 50% more effective during combat.
Magic Flower.Name: Magic Flower

Mark of Pain.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Start combats with 2 Wounds in your draw pile.
Mark of Pain.Name: Mark of Pain

Matryoshka.Description: The next 2 chests you open contain 2 Relics. (Excludes boss chests)
Matryoshka.Name: Matryoshka

Meat on the Bone.Description: If your HP is at or below 50% at the end of combat, heal 12 HP.
Meat on the Bone.Name: Meat on the Bone

Medical Kit.Description: Status cards can now be played. Playing a Status will Exhaust the card.
Medical Kit.Name: Medical Kit

Membership Card.Description: In future acts, shops appear 50% more often. BONUS: 20% discount on all products!
Membership Card.Name: Membership Card

Mercury Hourglass.Description: At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
Mercury Hourglass.Name: Mercury Hourglass

Molten Egg.Description: Whenever you add an Attack card to your deck, it is Upgraded.
Molten Egg.Name: Molten Egg

Mummified Hand.Description: Whenever you play a Power, a random card in your hand costs 0 for the turn.
Mummified Hand.Name: Mummified Hand

Necronomicon.Description: The first Attack played each turn that costs 2 or more is played twice. When you take this relic, become Cursed.
Necronomicon.Name: Necronomicon

Neow's Lament.Description: Enemies in your first 3 combats will have 1 HP.
Neow's Lament.Name: Neow's Lament

Nilry's Codex.Description: At the end of each turn, you can choose 1 of 3 random cards to shuffle into your draw pile.
Nilry's Codex.Name: Nilry's Codex

Ninja Scroll.Description: Start each combat with 3 Shivs in hand.
Ninja Scroll.Name: Ninja Scroll

Nloth's Gift.Description: Triples the chance of receiving rare cards as monster rewards.
Nloth's Gift.Name: Nloth's Gift

Odd Mushroom.Description: When Vulnerable, take 25% more damage rather than 50%.
Odd Mushroom.Name: Odd Mushroom

Oddly Smooth Stone.Description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Dexterity.
Oddly Smooth Stone.Name: Oddly Smooth Stone

Omamori.Description: Negate the next 2 Curses you obtain.
Omamori.Name: Omamori

Orichalcum.Description: If you end your turn without Block, gain 6 Block.
Orichalcum.Name: Orichalcum

Ornamental Fan.Description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 4 Block.
Ornamental Fan.Name: Ornamental Fan

Orrery.Description: Choose and add 5 cards to your deck.
Orrery.Name: Orrery

Pantograph.Description: At the start of boss combats, heal 25 HP.
Pantograph.Name: Pantograph

Paper Krane.Description: Enemies with Weak deal 50% less damage rather than 25%.
Paper Krane.Name: Paper Krane

Paper Phrog.Description: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage rather than 50%.
Paper Phrog.Name: Paper Phrog

Peace Pipe.Description: You can now remove cards from your deck at Rest Sites.
Peace Pipe.Name: Peace Pipe

Pen Nib.Description: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage.
Pen Nib.Name: Pen Nib

Philosopher's Stone.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. ALL enemies start with 2 Strength.
Philosopher's Stone.Name: Philosopher's Stone

Prayer Wheel.Description: Non-Boss chests now also contain cards.
Prayer Wheel.Name: Prayer Wheel

Question Card.Description: On Card Reward screens, choose from 4 cards instead of 3.
Question Card.Name: Question Card

Red Mask.Description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.
Red Mask.Name: Red Mask

Red Skull.Description: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 3 additional Strength.
Red Skull.Name: Red Skull

Regal Pillow.Description: Heal an additional 15 HP when you rest.
Regal Pillow.Name: Regal Pillow

Ring of the Snake.Description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.
Ring of the Snake.Name: Ring of the Snake

Runic Cube.Description: Max HP is lowered by 20%. Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 card.
Runic Cube.Name: Runic Cube

Runic Dodecahedron.Description: If your HP is full, gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn.
Runic Dodecahedron.Name: Runic Dodecahedron

Runic Dome.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer see enemy Intents.
Runic Dome.Name: Runic Dome

Runic Pyramid.Description: At the end of your turn, you no longer discard your hand. Draw 1 less card each turn.
Runic Pyramid.Name: Runic Pyramid

Self-Forming Clay.Description: Whenever you lose HP in combat, gain 3 Block next turn.
Self-Forming Clay.Name: Self-Forming Clay

Shovel.Description: You can now Dig for loot at Rest Sites.
Shovel.Name: Shovel

Shuriken.Description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.
Shuriken.Name: Shuriken

Singing Bowl.Description: Whenever you skip a card reward, increase your Max HP by 2.
Singing Bowl.Name: Singing Bowl

Smiling Mask.Description: The merchant's card removal service now always costs 50 Gold.
Smiling Mask.Name: Smiling Mask

Snecko Eye.Description: Draw 2 additional cards each turn. Start each combat Confused.
Snecko Eye.Name: Snecko Eye

Snecko Skull.Description: Whenever you apply Poison, apply an additional 1 Poison.
Snecko Skull.Name: Snecko Skull

Sozu.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer use potions.
Sozu.Name: Sozu

Strange Spoon.Description: Cards which Exhaust when played will instead discard 50% of the time.
Strange Spoon.Name: Strange Spoon

Sundial.Description: Every 3 times you shuffle your deck, gain 2 Energy.
Sundial.Name: Sundial

The Courier.Description: The merchant no longer runs out of cards, relics, or potions and his prices are reduced by 20%.
The Courier.Name: The Courier

The Specimen.Description: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any Poison it has to a random enemy.
The Specimen.Name: The Specimen

Thread and Needle.Description: At the start of each combat, gain 5 Plated Armor.
Thread and Needle.Name: Thread and Needle

Tingsha.Description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy for each card discarded.
Tingsha.Name: Tingsha

Tiny Chest.Description: Gain 30 Gold. You are 10% more likely to find treasure in ? rooms.
Tiny Chest.Name: Tiny Chest

Tiny House.Description: Obtain 1 potion. Gain 30 Gold. Raise your Max HP by 5. Upgrade 1 random card. Obtain 1 card.
Tiny House.Name: Tiny House

Toolbox.Description: At the start of each combat, add a random colorless card to your hand.
Toolbox.Name: Toolbox

Torii.Description: Whenever you would receive 5 or less unblocked Attack damage, reduce it to 1.
Torii.Name: Torii

Tough Bandages.Description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, gain 3 Block.
Tough Bandages.Name: Tough Bandages

Toxic Egg.Description: Whenever you add a Skill card to your deck, it is Upgraded.
Toxic Egg.Name: Toxic Egg

Toy Ornithopter.Description: Whenever you use a potion, heal 3 HP.
Toy Ornithopter.Name: Toy Ornithopter

Unceasing Top.Description: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.
Unceasing Top.Name: Unceasing Top

Vajra.Description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength.
Vajra.Name: Vajra

Velvet Choker.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn.
Velvet Choker.Name: Velvet Choker

War Paint.Description: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Skills.
War Paint.Name: War Paint

Whetstone.Description: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Attacks.
Whetstone.Name: Whetstone
